channel.title: Spawning and keeping Npcs
channel.description: Hey guys I want to know how to spawn a npc which will stay in one place and it will stay even if I restart server. I tried ::npc and if I restart server it goes away. And then someone tell me which folder is it to make them say something?

item.title: Spawning and keeping Npcs
item.dc:creator: @Ckstunnerscape Ckstunner
item.description:
@Ckstunnerscape wrote:

k il get you code[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 29, 2008, 07:53:55 pm[/size][hr]You need to have autospawn.cfg and npchandler.java open because i need to give you 2 codes[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 29, 2008, 07:54:46 pm[/size][hr]Oh and You will have to also do some work[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 29, 2008, 07:55:56 pm[/size][hr]dude, add me on msn and send me your npc handler. java and autospawn.cfg

Read full topic
